titleStmt.title: Newes from Rome concerning the blasphemous sacrifice of the papisticall Masse with dyuers other treatises very godlye [et] profitable.
titleStmt.author: Hurlestone, Randall. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: By I. Mychell. for E. Campion,

notesStmt.note: Four dialogues, translated by Randall Hurlestone from Latin? (STC).
Translator's name appears in the heading of the dedication (leaf Aii).
Place of publication and printer's and publisher's names from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
The last two leaves are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
